full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA THAMS CAD KYI BYIN GYI BRLABS SEMS CAN LA GZIGS SHING SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING GI BKOD PA KUN TU STON PA ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @311A BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LA MNGON PAR BSTOD DO, ,'PHAGS PA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA THAMS CAD KYI BYIN GYI BRLABS SEMS CAN LA GZIGS SHING SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING GI BKOD PA KUN TU STON PA ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO, ,RDZOGS S+HO, ,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO DZI NA MI TRA DANG, SU RIEN DRA BO DHI DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZA BA BANDE YE SHES SDES ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA, ,BAN DE KLU'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA,
